message.content:
Based on the provided profiles, here's the ranking from most suitable (#1) to least suitable (#4):

#1 Rank (39 years old, IT Systems Technician):
- Stable employment at Swisscom
- Lowest housing costs
- Clear loan purpose (renovation and vehicle replacement)
- Strong financial profile

#2 Rank (46 years old, HR Specialist):
- Long-term employment at hospital
- Stable income
- Professional development purpose
- Moderate expenses

#3 Rank (59 years old, Marketing Manager):
- Close to retirement age
- Slightly higher expenses
- Less time to repay loan
- Professional development purpose

#4 Rank (25 years old, Construction Manager):
- Youngest applicant
- Highest professional expenses
- More discretionary spending
- Less established financial history

All candidates have:
- 100% employment
- Permanent contracts
- Very good credit ratings
- No existing loans
- No debt collection cases

The ranking considers age, income stability, loan purpose, and overall financial health.
